website_summaries.verdict: A set of goggles and a swim cap that features a fun shark design complete with fins.
pros: This soft, elastic silicone swim cap is large enough to also protect your child's ears, while the creative design is sure to make your child happy
The lenses of the goggles are shatterproof and offer UV protection for a young swimmer's eyes
cons: The swim cap and goggles are a bit on the pricier side, but the durability doesn't reflect the increased price

customer_reviews.title: My little shark loves it!
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a cap that would be waterproof and flexible enough to fit over my daughter’s thick head of hair... I’m so happy to say that this is doing the trick. After 3 swim classes, the cap has been great for my 3 year old! It kept her hair completely dry and the best part is that she loves to wear it! #sharkmode
customer_reviews.author: lilcherub44

customer_reviews.title: ... reviews but I knew how much my daughter would love the design being that she is a little fish
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried with this purchase after reading the reviews but I knew how much my daughter would love the design being that she is a little fish. My daughter is 4 with long thick hair and weighs about 40lbs and the cap fit perfectly. I’m glad I decided to buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fits well and stays in place keeping son warm
customer_reviews.text: bought this with a full rash guard for 4 year old son's swim lessons when he complained the indoor pool was too cold. Fits well, stays in place, and is cute as can be. Keeps him warm so he will stay in the pool during his 45 min lesson. I have received tons of compliments on it. 2 months after use, some of the colored paint is chipping off- but still works and fits great and still glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Cindie B

customer_reviews.title: Her hair was pretty dry when we removed the hat (her head was ...
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute swim hat! Fit my 4 year old perfectly (she has thin hair and is a little small for her age) with room to grow. We will definitely purchase again when we need another one! Her hair was pretty dry when we removed the hat (her head was hot, so lots of sweat!)
customer_reviews.author: Shaunna

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: Got my son the blue shark, after he saw so many kids at swim class had swim caps and he didn’t. We used it as a reward for trying hard and being brave at swim class. He LOVES it and is certain it makes him faster in the water. I have been rinsing it off after class and just quickly towel drying it to help it last longer, so far through 2 months of weekly swim classes it’s holding up great.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky Rubio

customer_reviews.title: Nice and colorful
customer_reviews.text: I purchased them for my daughter as we plan on taking swimming lessons. My daughter has long curly hair down past her back. Unfortunately, too much hair for the hat. So we had to return them. But I can see how they would work if she had shorter hair. I would definitely recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Absoulutely Worth The Buy & Worth The Try
customer_reviews.text: I absoulutely love this product. I was very concerned that it would not fit my 2 year old daughters head but it fits nice and snug Its also expandable so she still has room to grow in it! It took a while to write a review becuase we hadnt used it until a few days ago. It kept my daughter hair nice and dry as well even when fully submerged under water which was quite shocking to me. I can tell it was comfortable for her becuase she was not trying to rip it off and seemed to forget it was there. Wonderful product!!! Oh and not to mention super cute design!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Cute Minnow
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one for each of my little swimmers. Items arrived quickly and as described. It seems to fit the 4 year old perfectly but I have difficulty getting it on my 6 year olds head. Disclaimer: Swim caps are new to me and I have yet to research the proper way to put one on so I chalk it up to user error.
customer_reviews.author: Boltx4

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Do it!! Big waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The 1st day my daughter put it on it tore. Threw it in the trash. This is not worth the money at all. Don’t purchase this. Ended up purchasing another at Dicks sporting goods
customer_reviews.author: Keanya knowles

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cap!
customer_reviews.text: I let my little one choose her own cap. She choose the pink and loves it. She was so proud the first day she wore it to swim lessons. It completely kept her hair dry, and with her new goggles gave her confidence to dunk her head. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph picone

customer_reviews.title: Fits slightly small and doesn’t cover the ears properly. ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits slightly small and doesn’t cover the ears properly. Only use for toddler “boy cut” hair that doesn’t need to be tied up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good swim cap
customer_reviews.text: Was sent the wrong color originally, contacted the seller who immediately corrected the issue. Great customer service and good product, fits my toddler's head perfectly and looks great. She's very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: vear

customer_reviews.title: Covers ears and long hair.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves her new bathing cap. I thought it to be adorable and fits over her long hair also protects her ears. She told me she can swim faster when she has it on. She is 4 yrs. old and a cutie.
customer_reviews.author: Nana C

customer_reviews.title: Band broke🙁
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and fun. My daughter did not like the swim cap and just wanted to get her hair wet and my son borrowed these goggles and broke the elastic as he was adjusting them. 🙁
customer_reviews.author: Gaelicgirl

customer_reviews.title: It was waste of money
customer_reviews.text: It was waste of money. my grand daughters tried & tried to put on cap but it is too tight and it feels like putting on a small rubber band. After trying to help them put cap on, they had to remove as they state it gave them a headache as it was too tight and to try to take off was even a worse issue. Goggles were ok but not great either.
customer_reviews.author: A.H.

customer_reviews.title: We purchased this cap for our 6 ur old about ...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this cap for our 6 ur old about 3 weeks ago and have used it 6 times during her swim class. We usually just put her hair up in a ponytail but she was still having issues with the goggles sliding which kept her focus distracted as she kept fiddling with her loose hair and goggles. The cap fit snug but not tight and thick enough that we could stretch it without ripping. Problem fix, no more distraction while swimming.
customer_reviews.author: I Joyce I

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for my son that such a cute swim cap was available but as soon as he tried to put it on, the cap ripped. He was so disappointed. So am I.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria W Wong

customer_reviews.title: She's a cute minnow
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this from my granddaughter and she loves it. Looks so cute. we've only been to the pool twice since we got it but so far she hasn't stuck her thumb through it putting it on, which she did to that last one we tried.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not functional
customer_reviews.text: Looks cool but not functional at all. As soon as my child got in the water it came off.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus lewis

customer_reviews.title: A great swim cap for kids
customer_reviews.text: A great swim cap for kids. It's very tight. Her hair is almost completely dry except a little around the edges. I got it to protect her hair from the chlorine. It seems to be working very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not durable at all. Broke almost immediately.
customer_reviews.text: This kept my 6 year old daughter's hair mostly dry, just got a little wet around the edges. The adult/child caps that we've tried have all been huge on her but this kids cap was REALLY tight. Because of the fit I would have given it 4 stars, but less than a week of use and this thing split in two....not durable at all. Wish it had stayed in one piece.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon-aholic

customer_reviews.title: Cute design, quality not up to par
customer_reviews.text: Bought these cute swim caps for swimming lessons for my boys.... However with second usage, one of the caps split open when putting on my sons head.... Cute product design and my sons loved them but very disappointed that it only lasted through one use.

customer_reviews.author: Lourde j Owens

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and nice fit
customer_reviews.text: Got it to give a gift to my uncle's 3-year kid. She loved it very much. Good quality and look.
customer_reviews.author: RajT

customer_reviews.title: granddaughter loved this cute cap
customer_reviews.text: granddaughter loved this cute cap. we bought to keep her hair out of face while swimming. had trouble keeping it on,, but it was still useful. It is not as bright and pretty as in picture. I was able to find her in the pool full of kids.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn H

customer_reviews.title: They're super hard to put on without pulling some hair but ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my nephew and he loveddddd it! Everybody did, too! They're unique swimming caps and they really do protect the hair from getting wet. They're super hard to put on without pulling some hair but I guess that's how all swimming caps are. If you're trying to motivate your kids to swim or to put it on, this is the right product to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Shorouq A.

customer_reviews.title: Good swimming cap for toddler

customer_reviews.text: This is so cute. It's tight, of course, as it should be. Little difficult to get on my child's head but the instructions that come with it make it easier to handle.

customer_reviews.title: My daughter has a smaller head so it was a little big for her but we just folded up the edge a little and it worked just great for her swim lessons

product_meta.title: Start Smart Kids Fun Silicone Swim Cap for Boys and Girls - Sharks & Minnows
product_meta.description:
Being in the water just got way more fun! Featuring fantastic Shark & Minnow designs, these kids’ swim caps are great for recreational or competitive swimmers. 

Want to keep your child’s hair dry and out of the way—but hate caps that snag hair AND slide around constantly? The Kids’ Silicone Swim Cap by Start Smart Sports is a child-friendly improvement on classic rubber caps. It features ultra-soft, stretchy silicone material that ensures a comfortable fit on everyone from toddlers to tweens (and it won’t tug at hair). We’ve also included anti-slip grooves on the inside of the cap so that it stays securely on during leisurely swims and competitive races. Use it for bathing, too! 

Best of all, you can choose from 2 cool designs: our fierce, blue Shark with its mischievous grin and our pink, doe-eyed Minnow. Your child will love pretending they’re a sea creature in the pool or ocean (how ‘bout a rousing game of “Sharks & Minnows”?) — and you’ll love being able to spot them more easily in a crowd. Plus, no more stray hairs floating around in your pool.

 2 novelty designs – Shark & Minnow 
Waterproof (when head is not submerged) 
Top-grade silicone provides durability & comfort 
Anti-slip design won’t snag hair
Latex free
Ideal for long hair
Fits girls and boys ages 3-12


Click ‘Add to Cart’ to buy now!
feature_bullets: 2 Adorable Animal Designs: Choose from a blue Shark or pink Minnow with matching goggle. Kids go crazy for these unique, colorful swimming hats and goggles!
Safety First: Our eye-catching cap designs double as a safety feature! Now you can more easily spot your little swimmer while they’re playing in a crowded pool or ocean.
No More Foggy Vision: Features premium lenses with an interior and exterior anti-fog coating that also filters out sunlight. Kids 3-12 can swim with more confidence!

Soft & Comfortable to Wear: The swim cap is made of premium silicone material which is ultra-stretchy and soft, so it feels comfy and doesn’t snag hairs. The goggle offers a secure and comfortable fit in combination with adjustable straps and nosepieces.
Protective Lenses: High-quality lenses are shatterproof & offer 100% UV protection when outdoors. Plus, our goggles’ secure fit keeps water completely OUT of your child’s eyes.
